argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cramerimp.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | cramerimp.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | cramerimp.v | |- V = ( ( Base ` R ) ^m N ) |
| 4 |  | cramerimp.e | |- E = ( ( ( 1r ` A ) ( N matRepV R ) Z ) ` I ) |
| 5 |  | cramerimp.h | |- H = ( ( X ( N matRepV R ) Y ) ` I ) |
| 6 |  | cramerimp.x | |- .x. = ( R maVecMul <. N , N >. ) |
| 7 |  | cramerimp.d | |- D = ( N maDet R ) |
| 8 |  | cramerimp.t | |- .(x) = ( .r ` R ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ I e. N ) -> R e. CRing ) |
| 10 | 1, 2 | #P_matrcl | |- ( X e. B -> ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_simpld | |- ( X e. B -> N e. Fin ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. V ) -> N e. Fin ) |

| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) = ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) |
| 16 | 1, 15 | #P_matmulr | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) = ( .r ` A ) ) |
| 17 | 14, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( R e. CRing /\ I e. N ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. V ) /\ ( X .x. Z ) = Y ) -> ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) = ( .r ` A ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ( ( R e. CRing /\ I e. N ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. V ) /\ ( X .x. Z ) = Y ) -> ( X ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) E ) = ( X ( .r ` A ) E ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( ( R e. CRing /\ I e. N ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. V ) /\ ( X .x. Z ) = Y ) -> ( D ` ( X ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) E ) ) = ( D ` ( X ( .r ` A ) E ) ) ) |
| 20 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 15 | #P_cramerimplem2 | |- ( ( ( R e. CRing /\ I e. N ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. V ) /\ ( X .x. Z ) = Y ) -> ( X ( R maMul <. N , N , N >. ) E ) = H ) |
